name: Schedule 15N-Is MicroServices Apt for Large Imaging Modalities or Desktop Apps

messages.speech: Microservices are a collection of loosely coupled services, which implement business capabilities. The advantages are that it enables the faster continuous delivery/deployment of large, complex applications. It also enables an organization to evolve its technology stack. Predominantly the Microservices Architecture is used in the context of web/cloud solutions. How else can I help you ?
